description: In Antenna House Office Server Document Converter version V6.1 Pro MR2 for Linux64 (6,1,2018,0312), a crafted Microsoft Word (DOC) document can lead to an out-of-bounds write, resulting in remote code execution. This vulnerability occurs in the `putShapeProperty` method.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Office Server Document Converter version V6.1 Pro MR2 for Linux64 (6,1,2018,0312)
